actions.description: The spirit makes a number of Reaping Scythe attacks equal to half the level of the spell (rounded down).
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: your spell attack modifier to hit (with advantage), reach 5 ft., the creature haunted by Haunt Creature. Hit: 1d8 + 3 + summonSpellLevel necrotic damage.
actions.name: Reaping Scythe

specialTraits.description: The spirit can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. If it ends its turn inside an object, it is shunted to the nearest unoccupied space and takes 1d10 force damage for every 5 feet shunted.
specialTraits.name: Incorporeal Movement
